price: Mos i bëni kurrfarë të keqeje asaj, se do t’ju godasë dënimi i një Dite të madhe!
arabic: وَلَا تَمَسُّوهَا بِسُوٓءٖ فَيَأۡخُذَكُمۡ عَذَابُ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٖ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: walā tamassūhā bisūin fayakhudhakum ʿadhābu yawmin ʿaẓīmin
